body.p:
Louisville March 6th 1865
To Honl Secty of State
Frankfort Ky
Sir
My Friend Capt W. R. Hunter late of 10th Ky Inf desirous the appointment as Notary Public for Nelson County Kentucky

I am well acquainted with Capt W. R. Hunter & can recommend him as being a Gentleman and every way worthy and qualified for the position If further Recommendation is required. Cap W R Hunter requests me to inform you that he refers you to Attorney Genl John M. Harlan formerly Col of 10th Ky Inf
P. S. you will on receipt of this letter if satisfactorly remit the appointment to W. R. Hunter Care of Marks & Co Bankers Louisville Ky

I am sir Yours
Very Respectfully
B. Marks
N P. J. C

Nelson Co
Notary Public
W R Hunter
apptd 10th Mch 1865
